# Data Source (zitadel_action_target)

Datasource representing a target, which can be used in executions.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `target_id` (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- `endpoint` (String) The endpoint of the target.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `interrupt_on_error` (Boolean) Define if any error stops the whole execution.
- `name` (String) The name of the target.
- `target_type` (String) The type of the target.
- `timeout` (String) Timeout defines the duration until ZITADEL cancels the execution.
